entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
